ingredients.ingredient: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans cream of mushroom soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup with garlic
ingredients.searchTerm: cream of mushroom soup with garlic
ingredients.normalizedName: Cream of Mushroom Soup with Garlic

ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix (such as Lipton®)

cookingTips: Brown the cube steaks briefly before adding to slow cooker for color
Cook on low for 6-8 hours until beef is tender
Cook noodles separately and add just before serving to prevent mushiness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook understand how canned soups create a creamy sauce while maintaining tender meat texture.
